sentences.en: After awhile, the minister fixed his eyes on Hester Prynne's.
sentences.cn: 过了一会, 牧师的目光紧紧盯住海丝特-白兰的眼睛.

sentences.en: After dinner sit awhile, after supper walk a mile.
sentences.cn: 正餐以后,休息片刻;晚餐以后, 步行一里.

sentences.en: After talking awhile with Taoist Wang, they realised his interest.
sentences.cn: 略略交谈几句, 就知道了道士的品位.

sentences.en: He fought with the urge to smoke one of the cigars he'd given up awhile ago.
sentences.cn: 他努力克制自己的烟瘾，不去抽一支戒掉没多久的雪茄。

sentences.en: He worked awhile as a pharmacist in Cincinnati.
sentences.cn: 他在辛辛那提做了一阵子的药剂师。

sentences.en: Her uncle looked at her awhile with genial acuteness.
sentences.cn: 姨父看了她一眼,目光显得和蔼而犀利.

sentences.en: It's kind of nice out here, so I think I'll just sit awhile. "
sentences.cn: 外面挺舒服, 所以我想再坐一会儿. ”

sentences.en: Joe harassed him awhile, and then he got away and crossed back again.
sentences.cn: 乔捉玩了一阵, 它又逃掉,跑到汤姆那边.

sentences.en: Now you better think'bout this awhile.
The bus is not due yet awhile.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车还要一会儿才会来.

sentences.en: The men contemplated the treasure awhile in blissful silence.
sentences.cn: 那两个男人对着宝箱,喜滋滋的,不言不语.

sentences.en: The realization of this causes ambition to halt awhile.
sentences.cn: 而看清了这种情形的人,是要把野心暂时压伏下去的.

sentences.en: They rested awhile at the inn and then went out to eat.
sentences.cn: 大家在旅馆休息一会,便出去聚餐.

sentences.en: Tom struggled awhile and then retired , utterly defeated.
sentences.cn: 他结结巴巴要往下背诵,可过了一会,便好像只斗败的公鸡一样溜下场去.

sentences.en: We won't be leaving yet awhile , ie not for a short time.
Yet, he thought, he would hold his peace awhile.
sentences.cn: 然而, 他转念又想, 他还是暂且保持沉默.
